title: Potato pie with sausage and cheese
ingredients: ['750g Maris Piper potatoes, peeled and quartered', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', '400g sausages, each cut into 4', '100ml skimmed milk', '50g strong half fat cheese, such as mature Cheddar, grated', '1 teaspoon wholegrain or English mustard', '2 to 3 tomatoes, sliced']
